scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, likely a priest or prophet, places a crown on the head of a seated king who holds a scepter. The king is richly attired in a blue robe with gold trim and a red and gold cloak. The scene takes place within an architectural setting that appears to be a stone chamber with a vaulted ceiling and a small, barred window. The overall impression is one of royal investiture or coronation.
